node.title: ArkNET’s Rania Chiwawa to Graduate on August 31
node.description: VTuber group disbands September 1, remaining talents to go independent

node.title: Former JKT48 Member Aurel Mayori Teases VTuber Model
node.description: She teased a rigged VTuber model, with a caption translating to “what anime is this?”

node.title: Liliana Vampaia 3D Model Fundraiser Goal Reached
node.description: Malaysia-based MyHoloTV agency announced that the goal for Liliana Vampaia's 3D model fundraiser has been reached, 7 days before the campaign ends.
